name: Flèche: Vs. Geremilho
description:
This is a small game I did as a gift to Geremilho and Sprite

Just a RPG battle with my friend Geremilho, this is a sequel to another game made as a gift for me Arrowtale Vs. Chocolatte

I'm making a full game with all the battles I want to make and the full story, but this one is just his battle

hope you still enjoy the game :3

If you beat him at first try you'll get a little surprise
